collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (6 total Queries, 4 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `a`.`date`, `b`.`firstname`, `b`.`middlename`, `b`.`lastname`, `b`.`school_id`, SEC_TO_TIME(TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF( MAX(CASE WHEN a.remarks = "Out" THEN a.time END), MIN(CASE WHEN a.remarks = "In" THEN a.time END) ))) AS hours, `a`.`token` FROM `attendance` `a` LEFT JOIN `students` `b` ON `b`.`student_id`=`a`.`student_id` GROUP BY `a`.`date`, `a`.`student_id`

queries.hover: This query was called more than once.
This query was called more than once.

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `a`.`date`, `b`.`firstname`, `b`.`middlename`, `b`.`lastname`, `b`.`school_id`, SEC_TO_TIME(TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF( MAX(CASE WHEN a.remarks = "Out" THEN a.time END), MIN(CASE WHEN a.remarks = "In" THEN a.time END) ))) AS hours, `a`.`token` FROM `attendance` `a` LEFT JOIN `students` `b` ON `b`.`student_id`=`a`.`student_id` GROUP BY `a`.`date`, `a`.`student_id`
